processing_structure.text: Loop from 1 to the input value and check divisors

advice.text: You are in the coding stage: turn each remaining comment into code, starting with the loop and then the output.
Use an iteration from 1 up to n; for each candidate, test divisibility and accumulate into sum.
Write a for-loop that visits i = 1..n, inside it if i divides n evenly add i to sum, and after the loop print sum.
